Package ohos.nfc.tag

Class MessageRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.nfc.tag.MessageRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable

    public class MessageRecord
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Represents an NDEF record.

    MessageRecord is the metadata of NdefMessage. An NdefMessage instance consists of one or more MessageRecord.

    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Communication#NFC

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageRecord

        public MessageRecord​(short tnf,
                     byte[] type,
                     byte[] id,
                     byte[] payload)
        Construct an NDEF Record with specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        tnf - Indicates the TNF of the NDEF record.
        type - Indicates the payload type of the NDEF record.
        id - Indicates the ID of the NDEF record, which is used for referencing between NDEF records.
        payload - Indicates the payload, which contains user data.
        Since:
        3

      • buildApplicationRecord

        public static MessageRecord buildApplicationRecord​(String packageName)
        Creates an NDEF record for a OHOS application.
        Parameters:
        packageName - Indicates the package name of the application.
        Returns:
        Returns the created NDEF record.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the package name is empty.
        Since:
        3

        mimeData - Indicates the MIME data.

      • buildExternal

        public static MessageRecord buildExternal​(String domain,
                                          String type,
                                          byte[] data)
        Creates an NDEF record containing external data.
        Parameters:
        domain - Indicates the domain name of the data issuing organization.
        type - Indicates the data type.
        data - Indicates the data.
        Returns:
        Returns the NDEF record containing external data.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if either domain or type are empty or invalid.
        Since:
        3

      • buildUri

        public Optional<Uri> buildUri​()
        builds a URI from this record, or return null if it is invalid.
        Returns:
